item.title: Gas Cylinder Left Behind when previous tip cleared up, 2nd October
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. A previous tip in the location last week was cleared up but the gas cylinder which had been in the fire there has been left. Please can it be cleared up before it attracts further tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Noverton Lane, Southam, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip at the Location, 2nd October
item.description:
The location is Mill Lane where the road goes over a stream. The flytip is assorted black bags together with what looks like a small refrigerator. Please can this be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Very poor workmanship, 30th September
item.description:
Walking along Chosen Drive this morning I noticed the material used to patch potholes only a week or so ago had the consistency of black porridge still soft and pliable. In several places it has squidged out where the tyres of vehicles have passed over. Some holes look like the material was just sprinkled over and left, several holes were not even filled flush with the surrounding road surface. In one hole the material had obviously lifted out on the tyre of a passing vehicle. If this is the standard of pot hole repair being applied no wonder the situation never seems to improve. John Wright
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chosen Drive, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
